dict.string: Link this iPad to your Apple ID to prevent another person from activating it.
Link this iPhone to your Apple ID to prevent another person from activating it.
Link this iPod touch to your Apple ID to prevent another person from activating it.
Allow %@ to Use the Location of Your iPad?
Allow %@ to Use the Location of Your iPhone?
Allow %@ to Use the Location of Your iPod touch?
This %@ account has already been added to your iPad.
This %@ account has already been added to your iPhone.
This %@ account has already been added to your iPod.
Your %1$@ on this iPad will be uploaded and merged with %2$@.
Your %1$@ on this iPhone will be uploaded and merged with %2$@.
Your %1$@ on this iPod will be uploaded and merged with %2$@.
If you turn on %1$@ for this account, it will turn off %1$@ for “%2$@”. If you keep the %1$@ from “%2$@”, you will be asked to merge them with this account's %1$@.
Enabling Find My iPad on this account will turn off sync for “%@”.
Enabling Find My iPhone on this account will turn off sync for “%@”.
Enabling Find My iPod touch on this account will turn off sync for “%@”.
Enabling Find My iPad on this account will turn off sync for “%@”. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPad?
Enabling Find My iPhone on this account will turn off sync for “%@”. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPhone?
Enabling Find My iPod touch on this account will turn off sync for “%@”. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPod touch?
Enabling Find My iPad on this account will turn off sync and Find My iPad for “%@”.
Enabling Find My iPhone on this account will turn off sync and Find My iPhone for “%@”.
Enabling Find My iPod touch on this account will turn off sync and Find My iPod touch for “%@”.
Enabling Find My iPad on this account will turn off sync and Find My iPad for “%@”. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPad?
Enabling Find My iPhone on this account will turn off sync and Find My iPhone for “%@”. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPhone?
Enabling Find My iPod touch on this account will turn off sync and Find My iPod touch for “%@”. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPod touch?
Syncing with this account will turn off sync for “%@”.
Syncing with this account will turn off sync for “%@” and remove its synced data. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPad?
Syncing with this account will turn off sync for “%@” and remove its synced data. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPhone?
Syncing with this account will turn off sync for “%@” and remove its synced data. What would you like to do with the currently synced data on your iPod touch?
If you delete your account, all %1$@ stored in iCloud will be deleted from this iPad.
If you delete your account, all %1$@ stored in iCloud will be deleted from this iPhone.
If you delete your account, all %1$@ stored in iCloud will be deleted from this iPod touch.
You cannot delete your iCloud account because your iPad is being restored.
You cannot delete your iCloud account because your iPhone is being restored.
You cannot delete your iCloud account because your iPod is being restored.
Find My iPad helps you locate this iPad on a map and remotely lock or erase it.
Find My iPhone helps you locate this iPhone on a map and remotely lock or erase it.
Find My iPod touch helps you locate this iPod touch on a map and remotely lock or erase it.
Find My iPad allows you to locate, lock, or erase your iPad and prevents it from being erased or reactivated without your password.
Find My iPhone allows you to locate, lock, or erase your iPhone and prevents it from being erased or reactivated without your password.
Find My iPod touch allows you to locate, lock, or erase your iPod touch and prevents it from being erased or reactivated without your password.
Enter the Apple ID password for “%@” to turn off Activation Lock.
When not connected to Wi-Fi, use cellular network to transfer documents and data.
When not connected to WLAN, use cellular network to transfer documents and data.
Allow apps to store documents and data in iCloud.
This enables Find My iPad features, including the ability to show the location of this iPad on a map.
This enables Find My iPhone features, including the ability to show the location of this iPhone on a map.
This enables Find My iPod touch features, including the ability to show the location of this iPod touch on a map.
This enables Find My iPad features. Turn on Location Services to show the location of this iPad on a map.
This enables Find My iPhone features. Turn on Location Services to show the location of this iPhone on a map.
This enables Find My iPod touch features. Turn on Location Services to show the location of this iPod on a map.
Keep your passwords and credit card information up to date across the devices you approve. Your information is encrypted and cannot be read by Apple.
iCloud requires an Apple ID that is an email address (including @icloud.com addresses).
MobileMe requires an Apple ID that is an email address (including @icloud.com addresses).
iCloud Keychain is not enabled for this demo.
Locating your iPad on a map is disabled. Turn on Location Services to enable it.
Locating your iPhone on a map is disabled. Turn on Location Services to enable it.
Locating your iPod touch on a map is disabled. Turn on Location Services to enable it.
This Apple ID cannot be used for MobileMe Mail, but you can use it for other MobileMe services.
The %1$@ on your iPad will be merged with %2$@. Exchange %1$@ will not be merged.
The %1$@ on your iPhone will be merged with %2$@. Exchange %1$@ will not be merged.
The %1$@ on your iPod touch will be merged with %2$@. Exchange %1$@ will not be merged.
The %1$@ you previously synced with your Mac will be merged with %2$@.
The %1$@ you previously synced with your PC will be merged with %2$@.
Start using MobileMe with your MobileMe email address.
Your Apple ID or password is incorrect.
To use iCloud on this iPad you must accept the new iCloud Terms and Conditions.
To use iCloud on this iPhone you must accept the new Terms and Conditions.
To use iCloud on this iPod touch you must accept the new Terms and Conditions.
Only your main account can use Bookmarks, Photo Stream, Documents & Data, Backup, and Find My iPad.
Only your main account can use Bookmarks, Photo Stream, Documents & Data, Backup, and Find My iPhone.
Only your main account can use Bookmarks, Photo Stream, Documents & Data, Backup, and Find My iPod touch.
Go to icloud.com on your computer to move your information to iCloud.
Move Your MobileMe Account to iCloud
This account has already been migrated to iCloud.

This will delete all Photo Stream photos from your iPhone
This will delete all Photo Stream photos from your iPod touch
An error occurred while trying to save the iCloud account.
Get the most out of iOS.
Turning Off Find My iPod touch…
All documents & data stored in iCloud will be deleted from this iPad.
All documents & data stored in iCloud will be deleted from this iPhone.
All documents & data stored in iCloud will be deleted from this iPod.

Unable to collect iCloud Documents Logs

To use iCloud Keychain on this iPad, approve it from another device that uses iCloud Keychain or use your iCloud Security Code.
To use iCloud Keychain on this iPhone, approve it from another device that uses iCloud Keychain or use your iCloud Security Code.
To use iCloud Keychain on this iPod touch, approve it from another device that uses iCloud Keychain or use your iCloud Security Code.

To use iCloud Keychain on this iPad, approve it from another device that uses iCloud Keychain.
If you are unable to access another device, you can reset your keychain.

To use iCloud Keychain on this iPhone, approve it from another device that uses iCloud Keychain.
If you are unable to access another device, you can reset your keychain.

To use iCloud Keychain on this iPod touch, approve it from another device that uses iCloud Keychain.
